name: gems-from-the-nashville-craigslist-find-out-who-your-friends-are
title: Gems From The Nashville Craigslist: Find Out Who Your Friends Are
author: Morgan Levy
contentEncoded:
Folks, all we have to say is this: Choose your friends carefully. Please.

your friend lifted your skirt – m4w (broadway downtown)

hey, you were smiling at me and waving, your friend came out of left field and pulled your skirt up to your neck. i thought the situation was hilarious and you both were unbelievably sexy.

We feel bad for the poor girl. If you ever need new friends, Nashvillest is here.
